Adventurer Helper:
All right. To sum up a minute.
You must destroy Splendor Eyes Splendor Talon Zipper Splendor, Splendor Blade Wise Splendor, Apprentice Pilgrim page's Pilgrim Angry Splendor, Splendor of the Spirit, Splendor Pilgrim winner Splendor, Splendor Raider Splendor screamers Warrior Alliance of Splendor, Splendor Stamps, Crowned Splendor, Judge Fire, Judge of Light, Fang of Splendor, Splendor and Splendor Howling Arbiter , collect 20 lost Light Shower and take them High Priest Agripelyu in Rune. To make the task time for you to go to the Valley of Saints. You understand? Long live the journey!
